workflow.name: Capture and nurture fraud-proof leads with AI scoring, sheets tracking & multi-channel alerts
workflow.description:
## 1. Who's It For
- Ad agencies needing **automated lead capture**.
- Sales teams fighting **fraud** and scoring leads.
- B2B SaaS companies nurturing **prospects**.
- Marketing pros boosting **sales pipelines**.

## 2. How It Works
- Captures leads via **Webhook** from forms.
- Validates emails with **Verifi Email** node.
- Checks **IP** for fraud using **IP Lookup**.
- Scores leads (0-100) with **Function** node.
- Logs data in **Google Sheets**.
- Alerts sales via **Slack** for high scores.
- Sends **welcome email** via **Gmail**.
- Tracks email **opens** for engagement.
- Follows up after 24 hours if unopened.
- Updates **engagement scores**.
- Generates **weekly report** (leads, scores, avg.).
- Emails report to **sales head**.
- Offers: **fraud-proofing**, **AI scoring**, **nurturing**, **reporting**.

## 3. How to Set Up
- **1.** Link form to **Webhook** (POST to https://[your-n8n-url]/webhook/lead-capture).
- **2.** Install **Verifi Email** node (npm install n8n-nodes-verifiemail) on self-hosted n8n.
- **3.** Add credentials: **Verifi Email**, **Slack**, **Gmail**, **Google Sheets**.
- **4.** Set up **Set User Config** (e.g., score, channel, email).
- **5.** Adjust **Weekly Report** cron (default: Mondays 00:00 IST).
- **6.** Test with sample data (e.g., {"email": "test@example.com", "ip": "8.8.8.8"}).

## Requirements
- Self-hosted **n8n** (for **Verifi Email**).
- Credentials: **Verifi Email** key, **Slack** token, **Gmail**, **Google Sheets**.
- **Node.js** and **npm** for installation.
- Form to send data to **Webhook**.

## Core Features
- **Fraud Detection**: Email and IP validation.
- **Lead Scoring**: AI-driven quality assessment.
- **Automated Nurturing**: Personalized emails.
- **Real-Time Alerts**: Slack notifications.
- **Weekly Reporting**: Performance insights.

## Use Cases & Applications
- **Sales Teams**: Streamline lead follow-ups.
- **Marketing**: Enhance campaign tracking.
- **B2B SaaS**: Automate prospect nurturing.
- **Agencies**: Deliver client-ready reports.

## Key Benefits
- **Efficiency**: Automates manual tasks.
- **Accuracy**: Reduces fraud with validation.
- **Scalability**: Handles multiple leads.
- **Insight**: Weekly performance data.

## Customization Options
- Adjust **scoring** in **Function** node.
- Edit **email templates** in **Gmail**.
- Add **attachments** via **File** node.
- Change **cron** schedule.
- Integrate **CRM** with **HTTP Request**.

## Important Disclaimers
- For **educational** use only.
- Validate with your **risk tolerance**.
- Seek **professional advice** before use.
- Account for **market volatility**.

parameters.text: =New high-quality lead!  Name: {{ $json.Name }} Email: {{ $json.Email }} Lead Score: {{ $json["Lead Score"] }} IP: {{ $json.IP }} Timestamp: {{ $json.Timestamp }}

parameters.message:

parameters.subject: =Following Up, {{ $('Reformat for Email').item.json.firstname }}!

parameters.content:
## LEAD CAPTURE AND FILTERING
1. Connect your form to the **Webhook** node by setting its action to **POST** to
 **https://[your-n8n-url]/webhook/lead-capture**.
2. **Set User Config** node groups customizable variables. Update these in the Set node for your needs.
3. Set **Verifi Email** credential for validation. 
4. Customize **IP Lookup URL** if needed.

## SCORING AND NOTIFICATION
1. Adjust scoring logic in **Lead Quality Score Function**.
2. Set **Slack** credential for notifications.

## NURTURING 
1. Use **Gmail** credential for emails. 
2. Customize templates in **Auto-Send Welcome Email** and **Auto Follow-Up Email**.

## REPORTING
1. Set **Schedule Trigger** cron for weekly runs. 
2. Customize **report** email recipient

parameters.message: =Hi Sales Head, - Total Leads: {{ $json.report.total_leads }} - High Score Leads: {{ $json.report.high_score_leads }} - Avg Engagement Score: {{ $json.report.avg_engagement }}
parameters.subject: =Weekly Sales Performance Report - {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString() }}

parameters.content:
## MAIN OVERVIEW
This workflow automates:
1. **lead capture** from forms
2. **fraud-proofing** with **email validation**.
3. **IP geolocation**
4. **scoring quality**
5. notifying sales via **Slack**
6. **nurturing** with personalized emails
7. tracking engagement
8. following up on no-responses
9. emailing **weekly reports**.

**Who‚Äôs it for**: Ad agencies, sales teams, **B2B SaaS**.
**Requirements**: Credentials for Verifi Email, Slack, Google Sheets, Gmail. Customize variables in Set User Config.

## DELAY 
1. Weekly Report Trigger runs **Mondays** at **00:00**. 
2. Customize **sales_head_email** in Set User Config.

## VERIFI EMAIL(Community node)
- Validates email addresses using **Verifi Email API**.
- **Self-hosted** only: Install the n8n-nodes-verifiemail package **(npm install n8n-nodes-verifi-email)**.
- Set up a **Verifi Email** credential with your API key.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
